case_name_full: The People of the State of New York v. Jason Lawson

opinions.opinion_text:
Appeal from a judgment of the Onondaga County Court (Jeffrey R. Merrill, A.J.), rendered October 5, 2010. The judgment convicted defendant, upon his plea of guilty, of burglary in the third degree.
It is hereby ordered that the judgment so appealed from is unanimously affirmed.
Same memorandum as in People v Lawson ([appeal No. 7] 124 AD3d 1249 [2015]).
Present — Centra, J.E, Fahey, Sconiers, Whalen and DeJoseph, JJ.

court_short_name: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York
court_full_name: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
